1517337097_1L4dZcDF2maSKHDy788yhxpYnBWnX.body:
> [ssdifnskdjfnsdjk](#comment_75_1L4dZcDF2maSKHDy788yhxpYnBWnXadUtS): Thank you very much, it worked.

Huh? I don't see the comment you're responding to. I'll just leave this here in case anyone else needs help:
What you have to do is add the providers to the parameter of the certSelect calls in the script. So, change:
```javascript
Page.cmd("certSelect", [["zeroid.bit"]]);
```
to:
```javascript
Page.cmd("certSelect", [["zeroid.bit", "zeroverse.bit", "cryptoid.bit", "kaffie.bit", "nanasi.bit"]]);
```
There's three of those calls in ZeroTalk's script.

1518182702_13vv2eRHS2KMArxEo1rKh4xQGogjJ.body: Don't delete (or empty) the data directory. That will delete all your accounts as well. Just delete zites (from ZeroHello) that you don't use anymore.
